```bash
172.17.0.2 - collabora ===\
172.17.0.3 - turtl ===    / :172.17.0.1 - docker0
172.18.0.3 - DOC ===\ :172.18.0.1 - br-52d8a2ec9f30
172.18.0.2 - COMM ===/
172.22.0.2 - freepbx === :172.22.0.1 - br-a2571d017dbb
```

</details>

```elixir
# Generated by iptables-save v1.6.0 on Wed Sep  4 16:14:07 2019
# 172.17.0.1 - default docker network "docker0"
# 172.18.0.1 - docker network bridge "br-b01dd16e6e64"
# 172.18.0.2 - docker guset destanation ip for interface eth0
*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [152395:10929182]
:INPUT ACCEPT [106479:8742319]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [231303:13884222]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [231771:14021301]
:DOCKER - [0:0]
# docker  autocreated this rules
-A PREROUTING -m addrtype --dst-type LOCAL -j DOCKER
-A OUTPUT ! -d 127.0.0.0/8 -m addrtype --dst-type LOCAL -j DOCKER
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.17.0.0/16 ! -o docker0 -j MASQUERADE
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.18.0.0/16 ! -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j MASQUERADE
# ports inside docker (docker-guest)
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.18.0.2/32 -d 172.18.0.2/32 -p tcp --match multiport --dports 80,443,2000,5038 -j ACCEPT
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.18.0.2/32 -d 172.18.0.2/32 -p udp --match multiport --dports 5000,5060 -j ACCEPT
-A POSTROUTING -s 172.18.0.2/32 -d 172.18.0.2/32 -p tcp --match multiport --dports 10000:20000 -j ACCEPT
-A DOCKER -i docker0 -j RETURN
-A DOCKER -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -j RETURN
# ports nat forward from docker-host to docker-guest
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p tcp --dport 9980 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:80
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p tcp --dport 9943 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:443
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p tcp --dport 2000 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:2000
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p tcp --dport 5038 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:5038
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p udp --dport 5000 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:5000
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p udp --dport 5060 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:5060
-A DOCKER ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -p udp --match multiport --dport 10000:20000 -j DNAT --to-destination 172.18.0.2:10000-20000
COMMIT
# Completed on Wed Sep  4 16:14:07 2019
# Generated by iptables-save v1.6.0 on Wed Sep  4 16:14:07 2019
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [1492141:1358271281]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [1505677:1407652063]
:DOCKER - [0:0]
:DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-1 - [0:0]
:DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2 - [0:0]
:DOCKER-USER - [0:0]
# docker auto create this rules
-A FORWARD -j DOCKER-USER
-A FORWARD -j DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-1
-A FORWARD -o docker0 -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -o docker0 -j DOCKER
-A FORWARD -i docker0 ! -o docker0 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i docker0 -o docker0 -j ACCEPT
# acceept
-A FORWARD -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j DOCKER
-A FORWARD -i br-b01dd16e6e64 ! -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j ACCEPT
# docker forward chaon
-A DOCKER -d 172.18.0.2/32 ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -p tcp --match multiport --dports 80,443,2000,5038 -j ACCEPT
-A DOCKER -d 172.18.0.2/32 ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -p udp --match multiport --dports 5000,5060 -j ACCEPT
-A DOCKER -d 172.18.0.2/32 ! -i br-b01dd16e6e64 -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -p udp --match multiport --dports 10000:20000 -j ACCEPT
# docker isolation
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-1 -i docker0 ! -o docker0 -j DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-1 -i br-b01dd16e6e64 ! -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-1 -j RETURN
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2 -o docker0 -j DROP
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2 -o br-b01dd16e6e64 -j DROP
-A DOCKER-ISOLATION-STAGE-2 -j RETURN
# DOCKER-USER autocreated chain for other custom docker rules
-A DOCKER-USER -j RETURN
COMMIT
# Completed on Wed Sep  4 16:14:07 2019
```
